name: sitetrack
description: A firefox extensions that lets you track stats about how often you visit specified sites

scripts.build: node-sass --output-style compressed variables.scss variables.min.css && node-sass --output-style compressed options/options.scss options/options.min.css && node-sass --output-style compressed popup/popup.scss popup/popup.min.css && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js jquery.min.js

author: Fionn Connolly
